Reviews.Title: LOVE this phone except some minor things
Reviews.Author: swimguppy
Reviews.Content: After having it for a week now I definitely got a good feel of the phone now. Out of the box I loved it!!! It was stylish, fast and pretty easy to use and set up. I loved how ez it was to customize everything. The phone is lightening fast running multiple apps seamlessly and for an average cell phone user it was more than enough to run tasks like light web browsing, media and messaging. There were some things I had a little problem with for example if your a big music person the stock music player doesn't have lock screen functions which is a BIG thing for me but winamp easily fixed that seamlessly syncing your playlists, etc from the stock android player. The stock messaging keyboard didn't have very good predictive text and it wasn't very good for typing long messages quickly so I ended up downloading swiftkey which is definitely worth it if you're a big texter and like typing quickly and accurately. The phone's internal memory itself comes out to be barely 4 gb compared to the 8 that was advertised and you aren't able to store apps onto the SD card which could be a bit of a problem if you're an app fanatic. But for personal files and media, expanding it with a 32gb sd card is no problem. The last issue I had with this phone was if you plan on using this phone without using mobile data, you won't be able to view multimedia messages using wifi because the s3 line requires you to download it through the carrier's network. All these were little hiccups in an otherwise amazing phone. You can't beat the features and design of the phone with the price. I would definitely recommend this phone in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: Me encanto. A great smartphone!
Reviews.Author: Solimar S Alfonzo D
Reviews.Content: ESPAÑOL:Debo reconocer que estaba dudosa de adquirir el producto debido a la confusion sobre si el telefono funcionaria en mi pais (Venezuela) o no, pero aun asi decidi comprarlo. Llego a mis manos hace 5 dias y hasta el momento me ha encantado. Sin detalles, ni defectos. La memoria interna si es de 8GB, solo que la utilizable es de 4GB, el resto es utilizada por los archivos internos del telefono inteligente.La camara toma excelentes fotos. La bateria dura aproximadamente 12 horas en un dia de uso normal, sin mucha musica y videos.Respecto a mi principal preocupacion que era la señal, no hay ningun problema, funciona perfecto en mi pais, levanta 3.5G.ENGLISH:I must admit I was dubious about purchasing the product due to confusion about the functionally of the phone in my country (Venezuela), but still decided to buy it. the smartphone came to my hands 5 days ago, and since, I love it. No defects, no problems. The internal memory is 8GB but only 4GB is usable, the rest is used by the internal files of the smart phone.The camera takes excellent photos. The battery lasts about 12 hours in a day of normal use without a lot of music and videos.About my main concern; the signal, there is no problem, works perfect in my country, up 3.5G.

Reviews.Title: Bait and Switch By this Vendor.
Reviews.Author: George E. Jones
Reviews.Content: This item was advertised as a NEW USA Samsung smartphone.What I got was a USED MEXICAN Samsung smartphone with a SPANISH User Manual.The box factory seals wear broken on both ends.I have photos to prove all the above!I want a $US 100 Goodwill CREDIT from AMAZON and this Vendor.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware!
Reviews.Author: Candace D.
Reviews.Content: BUYER BEWARE!  The factory seals on the box were broken and the seller attempted to cover them up with seals of their own.  The phone, box, instructions, etc are in Spanish.  This was not posted in the listing anywhere.  While you can change the language once you are in the phone, there are things like the email signature line that are still in Spanish.  I can't figure out how half the functions work on the phone without the English instructions.  Also, the shipping was so slow, I could've walked to the state it was being shipped from faster than it took the postal carrier to get here.  Huge disappointment.An update since my original post: I contacted Samsung for help.  This model DOES NOT EXIST...IT IS NOT A SAMSUNG PHONE!  IT IS FAKE!

Yo pedi 14 telefonos nuevos y ellos me enviaron Reconstruidos! no tienen cinta de seguridad y la etiqueta en la caja era incorrecta.

Reviews.Title: Perfect...Everthing as expected
Reviews.Author: Scott L.
Reviews.Content: I received my S3 mini about one month ago and have been very happy with this purchase. The phone arrived in an unopened Samsung box and was fully unlocked, as advertised. Arrived with charger (with USA and EU adapters) and headphones. I had read reviews about these unlocked phones coming from overseas (I'm in USA) so I was not surprised when I received a phone that appeared to come from Poland. I was easily able to navigate the settings menu based on the visual icons and looked up "language" in Polish on google translate. Less than 20 seconds after turning on the phone I had the menu switched to English and was off and running. Only suggestion, I should have bought a case with my original purchase instead of waiting for phone to arrive. Overall, great phone, great price and great buying experience...thanks!

The only real dissapointment I have with this phone is that thereception is not as good as my phone.  We live in an area where service can be somewhat marginal, my S3 usually has at least oneor two bars but her S3 mini sometimes doesn't have any service at all.

I live in the U.S. and i have consumer cellular as my phone provider. I bought this phone, stuck my sim card in it, and had no trouble at all setting it up. All i had to do was go through initial set up steps like language settings (it was in English (ireland) and i changed it to english (united states)). Connected to our WIFI and the WIFI at my work without any problems...this phone amazes me with what it can do in a phone that's not overly bulky. My brother got one of these as well and i set it up exactly like mine without a single problem.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone (once I got used to the Android OS and figured out how to use it)
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This phone was clearly for a Spanish market and came with no English instructions.  No problem.  Go online and find the manual with a Google search and download it.  What I like about this phone is how it does everything I need in one package.  I make calls with it (obviously), I play solitaire on it, and I read books with it.  I also use the Polaris Office app to seamlessly open all of my MS Office docs and allow me much better editing and control the my old Windows phone (a fact I find amazing).  As for reliability, it has been working great since I got it.  I have dropped it twice and it's still working fine.

Apparently the product ships from Mexico and came with Spanish as a default factory language (not a problem for me) but is easily changed.

Reviews.Title: Excellent smartphone for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Timothy Douglas
Reviews.Content: I have owned many types of cell phones (iOS, Android, Windows Phone 8) and I can say that this phone is definitely quite the value. It does not come with much bloatware installed, and as long as you have a MicroSD card, you should be plenty fine on storage.The only reason I took off one star, is because that it does not have LTE. I grew accustomed to LTE from other devices, but I can say that as long as you live in a good area for reception (with you carrier), HSDPA is plenty fast. On T-Mobile I have gotten upwards of 7mbps download and usually around 2mbps upload.The screen looks great, even though its not the highest resolution. The battery life is good too.Overall, I highly recommend buying this phone while it is around $180 and lower!

Reviews.Title: Telefono
Reviews.Author: Belkis C. Camacho
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone, I had no problem for applications, I am very satisfied with the product, I recommend it to anyone interested in buying this phone model.

I have had very good experience, this phone has met my expectations and I'm pretty satisfied. One thing that I liked is that you can customize the type and size of letters. The cell phone is being used in Venezuela, and it works fine. For those who are into buying a cell that will give the same uses it, I recommend it widely.

Reviews.Title: Mexican phone in Spanish
Reviews.Author: John M.
Reviews.Content: I just received this phone from seller Cell Lounge Inc. and it is a phone created for the Mexican market.  All text on box, user manual, and phone startup is in Spanish.I purchased this phone based on all of the great questions asked and reviews for my Brazilian in-laws to take back to Brazil with them.  Nowhere in the description does it say that you will be receiving a phone from Mexico.I am giving this a 3 star (average) review until my in-laws get back to Brazil and prove that it actually works for them.  I am skeptical at this point because the description should clearly state what you will be receiving.  It appears that others have had the same issue, and also that multiple sellers are using this same description.  I would prefer that this be stated in the description, because none of us can use the owner's manual in Spanish.

Reviews.Content: I have to give this phone 5 stars. Because it shipped faster that I thought, I was not charged tax because the price already included that. It is a very good price after all smart phones are usually very expenssive. I am very happy with this phone, and hope it keeps working perfectly like it does right now. I definitely recommend people who want a good phone, and cannot afford to spend much to consider this one. So many applications are available to download, it takes good pictures, and it stores all my music and pictures really well.

Reviews.Content: This phone has all the great things you want for fun with tons of room to download whatever you might want. Where I live it will only get EDGE but that's with any phone ive had when it comes to T-Mobile. The really good thing is that even though it only gets EDGE like the 3 other phones I have, its still by far the fastest one out there. The hotspot makes my computer sites come up at the blink of an eye. Has a great price for the things can do!

Reviews.Title: As good as S3 but not as huge
Reviews.Author: Federico Baseggio
Reviews.Content: Cool style. Its performance is ok, but don't expect it to respond to taps always fast. For those who like phones big enough to make the touch screen easy to use, but still easy to carry in your pocket this is "the" phone. Battery charge duration is good, more than a day if used "normally", or more than 2 days if you rarely use it.

Reviews.Title: Greate phone, especially for girls
Reviews.Author: abvigen
Reviews.Content: Looks nice, compact size with greate features. I bought black one for my doughter and she liked that. I would recommend anybody to buy this phone.

Reviews.Title: Excelent.
Reviews.Author: carlos efren fuentes
Reviews.Content: I'm really satisfied as the product as the service provided. Is really what I was expecting for,  I really recommend it.

Reviews.Title: receive gt-i8190 not the i8190
Reviews.Author: Jose Tineo
Reviews.Content: i just not give 5 stars because i receive the gt-i8190 model not the i8190  that i ordered, so  i cannot use with mi 3g provider.

Reviews.Title: General good
Reviews.Author: jorge
Reviews.Content: Fast behavior, reliable hardware, good display. The bad thing is that it doesn't tell when the signal is loosed and calls can't enter.

Reviews.Title: It goes to emergency calls only and has to be powered off and on.
Reviews.Author: Mike Knefaty
Reviews.Content: It goes to emergency calls only and has to be powered off and on.Not sure if this is caused by setting, "memory full", or just buggzy.

Reviews.Title: I like the phone but I hate that I can transfer my apps to my sd card
Reviews.Author: Roger A Johnson Jr
Reviews.Content: I got my phone pretty quick and it was on time for delivery I like the phone brand new and I likethe way it works but what I don't like is the international version and I can transfer my apps to my sd card but other then I love the phone

Reviews.Title: Worked Overseas in S. Korea
Reviews.Author: Jon Iwata
Reviews.Content: It's a good basic smart phone; paid $240 including the shipping cost to Honolulu.  Speed of delivery was excellent.  Am using it in S. Korea through a S. Korean carrier.  Just had to register this phone with the service provider here.

Reviews.Title: Apprehensive at first. ...
Reviews.Author: Kristi W.
Reviews.Content: I was so afraid of ordering a phone on Amazon! Not being able to talk to a rep, see or touch the phone before buying is a bit of a scary thing. I spent countless hours researcheing phones on Amazon. Checking sellers reviews, phone reveiws and customer reveiws. All I can say is that I am over the moon with my decision!  The Samsung Galaxy S III mini arrived ON TIME, IN PERFECT CONDITION and was exactly as described. I'm so excited! These are the kinds of businesses that make online shopping a stellar choice. Especially when you live in the middle of nowhere! I saved time and money. Who doesn't love that? If your looking for a phone that fits in your pocket but can still keep up with it's "big brothers" and save you hundreds of dollars,  this is it. I would recommend this seller as they filled my order with the appropriate product. No scams here! Oh happy day.

Reviews.Title: i like this phone
Reviews.Author: martin navas
Reviews.Content: Fine i like this phone, display is ver cool, phone comes with good protecction, os very qwickly thanks to processor
